extendedInfo.description: OnePunch Notes Pro is a convenient notepad application that is simple but powerful. It provices many features like calendar, password protection, photo/paint/voice record/music file attachment, Todo list, and folder management. Especially, you can attach all file formats that a notepad application can support, while it keeps its simplicity and usability. You can stick photo/paint/voice record/music, Todo list on your home screen as a widget, and it provices many powerful widgets like all notes list widget, calendar widget, D-day widget. Main features(Basic features)- Password protection- Home screen widget(9 sizes, 10 colors)- Folder- Index- Various sorts- Reminder/strikethrough- Import/Export- Backup/Restore(Only in Pro version)- Calendar- Anniversary management- Lock folder- Camera/photo/paint/voice record/music file attachment- Contacts attachment- Todo list that you can manage todo, shopping list- Note widget that you can stick photo, paint, voice record, music, Todo list- All notes list widget- Calendar widget- D-day widget- Quick note widget- Support free TTF fontsNotice: Please, keep your password, because you cannot restore your notes data if you lose your password.

reviews.title: No refund!
reviews.comment: I made the mistake of downloading this app again only to find out it\'s not what I wanted and they charged me even though I uninstalled it immediately. Great company huh?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bravi!!!
reviews.comment: Dopo averne provati un certo numero ecco il programma che cercavo. Fa praticamente tutto e in modo semplice e il rapporto prezzo qualit\303\240 \303\250 veramente basso. Bravi!!! Che altro si pu\303\262 dire? Ah si diverebbe meglio se le pagine riconoscessero i links e le email, come fa il notes normale.
reviews.author: Fabio Fabbri

reviews.title: Nice program, one big flaw for me.
reviews.comment: I found this app because of what it says, and I bought the pro version of it. The only bad thing that I found was that in the app, a calendar description only supports 26 characters, so when I look at my calendar data from Business Calendar, which has more than 26 characters, OnePunch cuts them off in their program plus Business Calendar too,so data is lost.  I sent two emails about it and no reply, so I un-installed it.
reviews.author: Rocky Hatt

reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!
reviews.comment: This app is absolutely perfect! It works flawlessly! Can sync to dropbox if you have dropbox app installed! Allows for flawless sync between my phone & tablet! Just share backup files with the dropbox app. Then export back to app when need to restore. Many thanks to Dev for THE perfect app! My system uses all the features in One Punch plus a hashtag system for seemless searching. Would give 100 stars if possible! Keep up the great work! My most used app on Android!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This is a great app. The only thing I would love to see is a not so \"post it note\" looking widget option. Just text with that same translucent background effect. No need for the lower right corner fold.
reviews.author: Jason Brazen

reviews.title: Idiot reviews
reviews.comment: I bought this just to reply to the \"no refund\" comment- First, Google sets the rules for refund timeouts. Second, there is a free version to try. Finally, rate the APP, please -  on its merits as described - or your comments are not helpful. Assigning a 1-star rating to an app that works well - and as described - because you felt ripped off (of a dollar) is silly.
reviews.author: Mark Stein

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: (MyTouch 4G Slide) This is one of the best note apps by far. Only one thing, please create color themes for the whole note app, such as black, white and multi-color themes. The current default theme hurts my eyes when viewing it in dark settings.
reviews.author: Ryan Seaforth

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Great app! Was excellent if it will support subfolders. And lock memo through pattern.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Great Note App
reviews.comment: A completely stable, full-featured app. I can\'t believe it hasn\'t been installed many more times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How to change widget colour?
reviews.comment: Does anyone know how change the note color in widget? Coz all the notes are all translucent blue as widgets. I emailed the developer to ask but no reply.
reviews.author: Georgina Chui

reviews.title: Nice app but needs better backup system
reviews.comment: Nice app however needs autosync or better backup system and wegdet table with images to be perfect.
reviews.author: Ahmad Suhail

reviews.title: So useful
reviews.comment: One of the first apps I installed when I hot my phone and I haven\'t found anything as good. Couldn\'t do without it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t download.
reviews.comment: Not user friendly at all.
reviews.author: Fermin Garcia Jr.

reviews.title: Great but
reviews.comment: no more update? I want to backup my notes with attached photos from gallery. Is it possible?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this one so much coz I can attach my contact list directly. This function is especially important to me since I have tons of customers info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tried many but like this best
reviews.comment: It took awhile to figure out how to set this up so that I like it. Very happy with it overall but please let this sync to drop box already! Definitely 5 stars  if it could do that. Just about every other Note program out there has some kind of sync.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: L\'ho amata..
reviews.comment: Ma alla fine cede il passo ad applicazioni pi\303\271 moderne. Quanto avrei voluto una seria sincronizzazione con google docs.. o anche su un sito proprietario (vedi evernote).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jelly bean
reviews.comment: Does not work on jelly bean. While adding widget it crashes. Please fix it asap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can write with SPen on the GNote!
reviews.comment: Can write instead of type notes on my galaxy note, very good. But needs updates. It does not display the written contents on the widget. Also cannot create more folders to keep notes organised. Cannot store on external card. Does not keep attached files like image etc with the note, so in case the attached file is deleted from the source folder then it gets deleted from the note as well, which is mighty pointless, especially if you wish to store the attached file only in the note with password protection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what I thought
reviews.comment: This app is nothing what I thought it would be.  The way it organizes your notes is very unintuitive.   With the widget or just the app icon, when you hit add a new note, it defaults to the last notebook you used...great if you only use one notebook. But now I constantly have to back out and back out to find the correct notebook....ugggg.  There is also no quick note function...really.  I don\'t have time to hunt for a place to store all my notes before I can even take them..give us the option to take a note and organize later.  And forget about syncing with your Google calendar....you\'ll have every task you\'ve ever entered flooding your widget...and the widget doesnt give you the option to have notebooks listed.  You can have one notebook with its contents displayed or have all notes displayed.   This is fine for someone who is not in a hurry and has time to sit and figit with it.
reviews.author: A Google User
